Items.Script: The robot was able to translate the words of a local farmer and, with instructions, it moved on. Its path ran through hilly fields and plains lit by the bright sun.

Climbing another hill, he saw on the horizon the same castle that he had seen from afar, from the top of the mountain range. Dazzling white, it towered above the ground. Many towers of different heights complemented and expanded the already immense building.
The robot immediately headed towards the castle, its legs moving faster, it was in a hurry to get inside, it was in a hurry to find out what was there, beyond its walls.
Finally, the traveler got closer. No one came out to meet him or even looked out of the windows. Not a single sound came from behind the walls.

Having stopped, the robot took another look at the castle. It had been standing here for a long time, but, as if it had just appeared out of nowhere, it looked unnaturally perfect: the masonry was even, there were no cracks, no cracks, no chips; the walls had a uniform white color, without stains and dirt. This isolated place seemed somehow artificial, inanimate, it was the embodiment of ideal order.

The robot's further path was blocked by a deep ditch with water. On the other side, a folding bridge stood vertically, which was held by old chains. The traveler noticed that the link of one of the chains was already almost , it will be possible to get inside the castle ...
